name: mldock
description: Downloads MarkLogic rpms and builds docker images hosting MarkLogic Server 8+ â€“ NodeJS/TypeScript library/CLI.
author: Daphne Maddox <laurelnaiad@gmail.com>

scripts-info.build: build src and test to build directory, copy dockerfiles to build directory
scripts-info.test: run tests and report code coverage into the coverage directory
scripts-info.dist: build src to dist directory, copy dockerfiles to dist directory, make package content in dist directory
scripts-info.cleanup: rm -rf the build, and dist and coverage directories

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/tsc -p . && shx mkdir -p build/src/dockerFiles && shx cp -R src/dockerFiles/* build/src/dockerFiles/
scripts.test: npm-run-all clean_build build && node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha build/test/index.unit.js
scripts.dist: node_modules/.bin/tsc -p src && shx mkdir -p dist/dockerFiles && shx cp -R src/dockerFiles/* dist/dockerFiles/ && node scripts/makePackage.js
